courseDetails.title: Professional Diploma in Copywriting and Business Writing
courseDetails.shortDescription: Copywriting, Content Writing, Content Marketing, SEO, Writing, Business writing, Career and Freelance strategy
courseDetails.longDescription:
Welcome to course: Professional Diploma in Copywriting and Business Writing


You will know about: what is copywriting, its prospects, selling texts formulas, how to write SEO-texts, how to write texts for social media, SMS mailing, email mailing, how to write texts for landing pages, how to affect on reader and their emotions, how to write emotional texts, structure of commercial offers and technical tasks, how to look for a job and lifehacks for applying for a job.


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry.

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


After finishing a course you will get: key knowledge about the work of a copywriter, text formats, how to write them and where to use them; selling texts and their formulas; rules for writing sms and email mailing; rules and structure of writing seo texts; rules for writing a commercial offer; text styles, where and how to look for work


Course Plan:

1. About profession, text styles and formats

2. Emotions in texts

3. Texts for social media and landing page, SEO text

4. Selling texts

5. Commercial offer

6. Technical specification, where and how to look for a job


Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:


Hello!

Welcome to the сopywriting course

In this course, we will learn the key and most important knowledge and skills for a copywriter. The course is compiled based on my experience and the requirements of different companies.

I want to draw your attention to the fact that each lesson has its own homework. By completing these tasks, you will be able to better understand the material covered and already replenish your portfolio.

After completing this course, you can safely get a job without being afraid of not knowing something.


A little about me

My name is Zhansaya, but for you I'm just Saya


I've been writing since I was a teenager. At first it was longreads for my Instagram, then I decided to monetize my skills and got a job as a copywriter in an educational center. Then I worked as a freelance copywriter in an advertising agency, in the medical and educational fields.

I really love this profession: it gives you the opportunity to express your creativity, regulate your work schedule and grow professionally.

I wish you new knowledge and hope that the course will be useful and effective for you!

courseDetails.title: JavaScript And PHP And Python Programming Complete Course
courseDetails.shortDescription: Learn JavaScript And PHP And Python Programming language In One JavaScript And PHP And Python Complete Course
courseDetails.longDescription:
JavaScript And PHP And Python Programming language Complete Course

  • Section 1- learn javascript programming language

    • The course is created with thorough, extensive, but easy-to-follow content that you’ll easily understand and absorb.

      The course starts with the basics, including JavaScript fundamentals, programming, and user interaction.


      the curriculum is going to be very hands-on as we walk you from start to finish to become a professional Javascript developer. We will start from the very beginning by teaching you Javascript basics and programming fundamentals, and then execute into real-life practice and be ready for the real world.


    • while Javascript is complicated for beginners to learn, it is widely used in many web development areas.

    • this course gets you started with an introduction to JavaScript. It assumes that you're new to the language, so it gets you started with basic functionality such as creating functions, creating variables, and calling these lines of code from your standard HTML pages. It talks about events and triggers for custom event handling. It talks about pattern matching, searching for text within a page, flow control, and the document object model (DOM). We start off with the basics and move on to more complex functionality such as arrays and objects. We then discuss how to script common elements with JavaScript such as forms and tables. At the very end, we discuss major libraries such as Ajax, which allows you to make asynchronous calls to server-side scripts without reloading the web page in the server.

    • Master the fundamentals of writing Javascript scripts

    • Learn core Javascript scripting elements such as variables and Objects

    • Discover how to work with lists and sequence data

    • Write Javascript functions to facilitate code reuse

    • Use Javascript to read and write files

    • Make their code robust by handling errors and exceptions properly

    • Search text using regular expressions

    • Javascript introduction

    • Javascript array

    • Javascript variables

    • Javascript functions

    • Javascript objects

    • Javascript control statements

    • Javascript cookies

    • Javascript loop statements

    • Javascript data structures

    • Javascript error handling

    • Javascript regular expressions



      section 2- learn PHP programming language

      This section will learn the basic structure of a web application and how a web browser interacts with a web server. You'll be introduced to the request/response cycle, including GET/POST/Redirect. You'll also gain an introductory understanding of Hypertext Markup Language (HTML), as well as the basic syntax and data structures of the PHP language, variables, logic, iteration, arrays, error handling, and superglobal variables, among other elements.


    • The topics covered in this PHP course are:


    • PHP various operator types

    • PHP arrays

    • PHP function statements

    • PHP decision making

    • PHP file Input and Output

    • PHP web concepts

    • and more..


  • Section 3- python programming language.

This course section provides an introduction to programming and the python language. students are introduced to core python programming concepts like conditionals, loops, variables, and functions. this section includes an overview of the various python aspects. It also provides hands-on coding exercises using commonly used writing custom functions, and reading and writing to files. this section or whole course may be more robust than some other courses, as it delves deeper into certain essential programming topics.

what you will learn in this section:

courseDetails.title: Women Leaders Executive Programme
courseDetails.shortDescription: Women's Leadership, Skills, Management Styles, Fem-Management, Situational leadership, Work-life balance
courseDetails.longDescription:
What you'll learn

● The history of the emergence of feminism and women's leadership

● Women's leadership in philosophy, culture and politics

● Gender problems in society

● Barriers to the development of women's leadership

● Myths about women's leadership

● Opportunities for women's leadership

● Women who changed the world

● Qualities inherent in women leaders

● Women's time management

● Work-life balance


Requirements

No special requirements. Course for any who want to know more about women's leadership, its phenomenon, history of feminism, how to manage time and being a mom, wife and worker, also for the ones who want to get inspired.


Description

Welcome to course: Women’s leadership


You will know about: what is women’s leadership and how it appeared and developed, how to lead as a women, what kind of gender problems we have, what are the barriers for developing women’s leadership, myths about woman as a leader, women who changed the world and their history, male and female time-management, how to manage time as a woman, flexible time-management, what is work&life balance and how to keep it, leadership experience from working moms


Course provided by MTF Institute of Management, Technology and Finance

MTF is the global educational and research institute with HQ at Lisbon, Portugal, focused on business & professional hybrid (on-campus and online) education at areas: Business & Administration, Science & Technology, Banking & Finance.

MTF R&D center focused on research activities at areas: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data Science, Big Data, WEB3, Blockchain, Cryptocurrency & Digital Assets, Metaverses, Digital Transformation, Fintech, Electronic Commerce, Internet of Things.

MTF is the official partner of: IBM, Intel, Microsoft, member of the Portuguese Chamber of Commerce and Industry, and resident of the incubator "The Fintech House of Portugal".

MTF is present in 208 countries and has been chosen by more than 380,000 students.


Course Instructor: Zhansaya Berdikulova,

Regional Coordinator of the leadership development project in schools of Kazakhstan, certified coach, leadership development coach

Bachelor of Economics and Business of University of International Business

Master of Economic Sciences of M.Auezov South Kazakhstan University

Experience:

Regional Coordinator of the leadership development project in schools of Kazakhstan, certified coach, coach for the development of leadership qualities of the public organization Association of Young Leaders


After finishing a course you will get: knowledge about leadership for women, how to live as a woman-leader, how to lead as a woman, how to balance the life as a wife-mom and a worker, tips for working moms and wifes, research in the field of women's leadership and also how to fight with gender problems and myths about women’s leadership.

Course Plan:

1. About the course, topic and author

2. History of women’s leadership

3. Phenomenon of women's leadership

4. Myths

5. Women leaders and their experience

6. Women's leadership and company success

7. Fem-management

8. Work-life balance


Course Full Description and Welcome Letter:

Hello!


Welcome to the online course on women's leadership. This course is intended for everyone, especially for women who want to learn about the origins of feminism and women's leadership, about gender issues, myths about women's leadership, as well as about the barriers that almost every woman faces on her career path.


The course consists of theoretical, historical and statistical data, and also offers tools for leadership in a woman's life based on clear numbers and methods.


This course is useful not only for women, but also for company owners, managers and directors, because it provides recommendations for maintaining a work-life balance of employees.


The aim of the course is to inspire women and show them a lot of what they are capable of and what they can do if they believe in themselves and their abilities.


A little about me


My name is Zhansaya, but for you I'm just Saya


For the last 10 years, I have been teaching adults and children leadership, communication, conflict management, decision-making, planning - all the flexible skills necessary for life and work.


For 3 years I have been the regional coordinator of the republican leadership development project and work closely with women who study leadership.


In addition, I am a wife and mother of a newborn. Higher economic education in the field of marketing and management helps me to lead not only as a life skill, but also as a professional. All these skills and knowledge help me to manage my life, make it more effective and live not only for the family, but for myself too.


I hope that the course will be useful and effective for you, and inspire you to become the very best version of yourself.


Linked Topics:

  • Marketing Fundamentals

  • Management Fundamentals

  • Business Fundamentals

courseDetails.longDescription:
Want to use AI (Artificial Intelligence) for Project Planning Excellence but don’t know what to do and how?

Take a look at this course where you will

  • Not only learn about AI for Project Planning including how AI helps build Excellence in Project Planning, Case Studies of AI helping build Excellence, Building Blocks of using AI to build Project Planning Excellence and How to implement these AI Building Blocks for Project Planning Excellence in but also

  • Analyzing Project Timelines, Optimizing Resource Allocation, Identifying Potential Bottlenecks, Prioritizing Tasks for Maximum Efficiency and AI-Powered Dashboards and Decision Support

  • Preview many lectures for free to see the content for yourself

  • Clear your doubts on this topic any time while doing the course

  • Get Udemy’s 30 days Money Back Guarantee

My exposure to AI for Project Planning Excellence started as early as the 2010s with Early Automation & Rules-Based Systems

· Tools: MS Project, Primavera P6

· Techniques: Critical path analysis, Gantt charts, simple scheduling algorithms

· AI Use? Not really — only if-then rules and basic macros

· Focus was on automating timelines, not learning or decision-making

I continued to learn during 2010–2017 when AI/ML Adoption Begins

· Key Trigger: Explosion of enterprise project data + cloud-based tools

· Use Cases Introduced:

o Predictive analytics for task delays

o Natural Language Processing (NLP) to extract action items from meetings

o Basic ML models to identify at-risk tasks

· Tools Emerged: Clarizen, Wrike, Smartsheet began incorporating ML features

Notable Milestone:

· Google’s internal tools and IBM Watson began experimenting with ML-driven scheduling and resource optimization

I continued to learn with 2018–Present with use of AI for Project Intelligence

· Mainstream Use: AI integrated into project management platforms

· Advanced Capabilities:

o Monte Carlo simulations for timeline prediction

o AI-based task prioritization (Asana, ClickUp, Microsoft Viva)

o Generative AI/NLG for real-time executive summaries

o Dynamic resource allocation via ML models

· Real-time dashboards powered by Power BI + AI or Tableau GPT

Post-2020 Surge:

· Generative AI (ChatGPT, Claude, Copilot) integrated into PM tools

· Agile teams using AI to manage backlogs, estimate velocity, detect blockers

I bring in this course my learnings from this journey and share with you how can you also can successfully use AI for Project Planning Excellence

Preview for yourself many lectures free. If you like the content, enrol for the course, enjoy and skill yourself to start using AI for Project Planning Excellence

Please remember that this course comes with Udemy’s 30 days Money Back Guarantee

Please remember to reach out to me for any help in enjoying this course after you enroll

Hello everyone and welcome to the online-course created for any current or potential corporate managers from junior to executive level, that will make you stand out from the others.

This course might become your first step to acquire skill set, knowledges and maybe even a whole new profession, that is appearing right now. Learning it today, gives you advantages tomorrow!

I’m talking about digital transformation. In terms of customer communications in basically any meduim or big enterprises. And for small businesses, the most succesfull ones, they are already doing it in a modern way from the first day.

This transformation - it is a moving away from old way of communications, like phone calls, email, or even fax - to new way - whatsapp, facebook messenger, instagram direct messages, telegram - any messaging apps that people are using in their everyday life. And now they are starting to usу it to talk to businesses. To chat with an online store, with a bank, medical clinic - with any organization out there.

And here lies the opportunity!

All of these companies need employees or contractors who understand how to make this shift, this transition. New channels on the one hand bring a lot of new possibilities, such as chatbots and artificial intelligence, and on the other hand, require a rebuilding of current business workflows.

For example agent’s KPI in a contact centre based on whatsapp, is very different from a voice-based CC. And somebody need to know how to deal with it.

But the contact center is not the only place where apps like whatsapp are taking over. It affects pretty much every customer related departpent: sales, marketing and loyalty, support, customer experience, automation and online services.

So, Whether you plan to tie your career or business entirely to this feild, this knowledge will help you achieve your professional goals in a variety of ways. Because communication - is the essential part of business.

I started this journey seven years ago, when it was hardly even existed. Since then, I have worked with some of the world's biggest clients, such as Societe Generale, British american tobacco and others. Now I’m a founder of a startup called brandy. im

I invite you to my course where you will learn the basics about communications of the future. Welcome!



Before we start I want to give a quick intro of myself and also let’s take a look on the course plan.

So without further ado, here is what we will discuss

The course consists of 2 parts:

In a first one, everything down lesson 4, we are talking about the key benefits for business in general.

And then learning the basics of chatbots and AI.

The second part is becoming more specific.

We will see how exactly it implies to different departments. Discuss business application of particular messaging channels.

And with all of that we are getting ready to meet the main framework –

of ideal customer journey in modern channels. Which will be useful tool to any of your further projects.

And briefly about me.

You can call me Slava. For a last 7 years I’ve been running chat platform startup. For these years we made a lot of stuff, worked with some worldwide clients.

We have become official provider of apple messages for business. Not sure if this is my most significant achievement, but personally, the most pleasant one. A chance to work directly with apple team is really cool

and I have been honoured to become one of the business experts at the Retail banking school, where we are right now.

Feel free to connect or ask me anything on linkedin.

And, let’s jump in!

Short Description: Course will be interesting to anybody who want to acquire essential skills about Corporate management. This course will take practical examples to explain basic principles of corporate management and how it is important in  business. This will help in developing as a corporate person and become a better manager.


Management learning is critically important for both companies and individual managers, as it plays a pivotal role in achieving organizational success, fostering leadership skills, and advancing individual careers. Here's why management learning is significant for companies and managers:


For Companies:

Enhanced Productivity and Efficiency: Effective management practices help streamline workflows, allocate resources efficiently, and optimize processes. When managers are well-versed in management principles, companies can operate more productively, leading to cost savings and improved profitability.


Innovation and Adaptability: In a rapidly changing business environment, companies must continuously innovate and adapt. Management learning equips managers with the tools and knowledge to foster a culture of innovation and navigate through evolving market conditions.


Employee Engagement and Retention: Skilled managers can create a positive work environment, motivate employees, and build strong teams. This leads to higher employee engagement and lower turnover rates, reducing recruitment and training costs for the company.


Strategic Decision-Making: Management education provides managers with the ability to make informed, data-driven decisions. Strategic thinking and decision-making skills are essential for achieving long-term business goals.


Conflict Resolution and Communication: Effective communication and conflict resolution are vital in any organization. Managers with management training are better equipped to handle conflicts, promote teamwork, and maintain a harmonious workplace.


Risk Management: Companies face various risks, from financial to operational and reputational. Management learning helps managers identify, assess, and mitigate these risks, ensuring the company's stability and sustainability.


Customer Satisfaction: Managers with a deep understanding of management principles are more likely to focus on customer needs and satisfaction. This customer-centric approach can lead to increased loyalty and revenue.


For Managers:

Career Advancement: Management learning is crucial for career growth. Employers often prioritize candidates with management education and experience when filling leadership positions.


Leadership Development: Management education enhances leadership skills, including decision-making, problem-solving, and team management. These skills are transferable and valuable throughout one's career.


Increased Confidence: Managers who undergo management training gain confidence in their abilities. This confidence translates into better leadership and a greater capacity to handle challenging situations.


Networking Opportunities: Management courses and programs often facilitate networking with peers and industry experts. Building a strong professional network can open doors to new opportunities and insights.


Personal Growth: Management learning is not only about career advancement but also personal growth. It encourages self-reflection, self-improvement, and a better understanding of one's strengths and weaknesses.


Adaptation to Change: In today's dynamic business world, the ability to adapt to change is essential. Management education equips managers with the skills to thrive in uncertain and evolving environments.


Job Satisfaction: Effective management leads to more successful teams and projects, which can result in greater job satisfaction for managers. A fulfilling career is often linked to the ability to manage and lead effectively.


In conclusion, management learning is vital for both companies and managers. It empowers organizations to operate efficiently, innovate, and achieve their goals while providing managers with the tools and knowledge needed for career growth, personal development, and effective leadership. A strong foundation in management principles benefits everyone involved and contributes to long-term success.
targetAudiences: Professionals with any background who wants to upgrade management skills

courseDetails.title: Crea un MarketPlace Multi Vendedor con WordPress y Dokan
courseDetails.shortDescription: Genera ingresos creando tu propio Marketplace Multi Vendedor al estilo de Amazon o Mercado Libre.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UN MARKETPLACE MULTIVENDEDOR CON WORPDRESS, WOOCOMMERCE Y DOKAN PARA GENERAR INGRESOS CON MÚLTIPLES TIENDAS DESDE UN MISMO LUGAR?

El Marketplace se refiere a un concepto más amplio de ventas online. En esta plataforma, diferentes tiendas pueden anunciar sus productos, ofreciéndole de esa forma, un abanico de opciones al cliente.

El concepto de Marketplace no es nuevo. En América Latina surgió en 2012 y, hoy en día, muchas grandes empresas digitales ya se han adherido. Algunos ejemplos de Marketplace son Amazon, Google Shopping y Mercado Libre.

Como ya dijimos existen varias diferencias entre un Marketplace y un E-Commerce.

En el caso de un E-Commerce, entras en el sitio web de una tienda X y eliges un producto que es vendido y enviado por la propia tienda.

En el caso de un Marketplace puedes entrar en el sitio web de la tienda X y elegir un producto que está siendo vendido y enviado por la tienda Y.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?

WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.

Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


¿QUÉ ES WOOCOMMERCE?

WooCommerce es un plugin (complemento) de WordPress que permite implementar una tienda online totalmente funcional en una web.

Este plugin incluye todo lo necesario para empezar a vender en línea:

Las páginas de tienda, carrito, mi cuenta y finalizar compra, los métodos de pago más utilizados en el mundo (transferencia bancaria, PayPal y Stripe), un sistema para configurar diferentes tipos de impuestos y gastos de envío por zonas, etc.

Por supuesto, también permite la subida de un número ilimitado de productos para su venta, pudiendo añadir su precio, descripciones (una corta y una larga), variaciones del mismo, etc.

En definitiva, WooCommerce es una de las mejores opciones que existen para crear una tienda online.


¿QUÉ ES DOKAN?

Dokan es un complemento de múltiples proveedores para WordPress diseñado para ayudar a los proveedores a personalizar las tiendas y administrar el inventario de productos desde una plataforma unificada.

Proporciona una solución completa multivendedor para crear un marketplace con WooCommerce. Su diseño e interfaz súper intuitivos hacen la configuración y gestión de la tienda multivendedor muy sencilla, incluso para principiantes. Su automatización es tan completa que prácticamente sólo tendrás que revisar los pedidos

En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar un Marketplace Multi Vendedor, utilizando la plataforma de WordPress y los plugins de WooCommerce y Dokan que nos brindará todas las funciones y opciones necesarias para crear y diseñar nuestro Marketplace Multi Vendedor, que llevarán su negocio a un siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su Marketplace Multi Vendedor con WordPress, WooCommerce y Dokan, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su Marketplace Multi Vendedor diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo crear un Marketplace Multi Vendedor con WordPress, WooCommerce y Dokan.

  • Cómo instalar una plantilla para tu Marketplace.

  • Cómo instalar Dokan en su versión gratuita.

  • Cómo agregar productos como vendedor de tu Marketplace.

  • Cómo simular un proceso de compra en tu Marketplace.

  • Revisar las principales funciones de Dokan en su Versión Gratuita.

  • Cómo instalar Dokan en su versión premium.

  • Revisar las principales funciones de Dokan en su Versión Premium.


¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Crea un MarketPlace Multi Vendedor con WordPress y Dokan", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 185,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un Marketplace Multi Vendedor con WordPress, WooCommerce y Dokan de forma rápida y sencilla.

courseDetails.title: Sustainable Manufacturing: Review & Emerging Advances
courseDetails.shortDescription: A short & concise course on what you need to know about Sustainable Manufacturing
courseDetails.longDescription:
Being responsible for over 20% of accumulated greenhouse gas emissions, the manufacturing sector has been the third major contributor to the overall global environmental pollution. Given the high awareness of the need for a better quality of life, the socio-economic impacts of manufacturing activities are also globally recognized.


According to the UN Environment Programme report, both the production and the consumption sides of the industrial cycle carry significant harmful impacts on the environment in the form of toxic gases and acidic substances released, as well as the immense drainage of non-renewable resources.


Hence, manufacturing processes and the industrial supply chain are among the most damaging factors, where timely industrial action and policy intervention are crucial. Sustainable manufacturing has made big strides in recent years and has changed the industry considerably.


This course introduces the subject of Sustainable manufacturing at the beginning and follows with a brief reminder on sustainability, and then dives into the concept of sustainable manufacturing. The course explains afterwards the pillars of sustainable manufacturing, which include Supply chain, Materials, Design and production, and management and policy-making. This course also takes an interest in emerging advances in Sustainable Manufacturing, such as Industry 4.0, Circular economy, Additive manufacturing, and the use of Sustainable materials.


The topic of Sustainable manufacturing is covered from many angles through the following plan:


  1. Introduction

  2. Brief Reminder on Sustainability

  3. Understanding the Concept of Sustainable Manufacturing

  4. Key Areas of Sustainable Manufacturing

  5. Emerging Advances in Sustainable Manufacturing

  6. Take-home Lessons & Recommendations


I hope you enroll in the course to learn interesting knowledge about the trendy topic of Sustainable Manufacturing!

My exposure to AI for CRM Excellence started in early 2010s its Foundations was laid when

  • CRM platforms (like Salesforce, SAP, Microsoft Dynamics) primarily focused on data storage and workflow automation.

  • AI was mostly limited to simple rule-based recommendations or basic analytic like lead scoring based on static criteria.

I continued to learn about AI for CRM Excellence through

2015–2017 with Rise of Machine Learning and Predictive Analytics

  • Cloud computing matured, making it easier to store and process large datasets.
    Salesforce launched Einstein AI in 2016, marking one of the first major CRM platforms to integrate AI natively.

  • Microsoft began embedding AI features into Dynamics 365 around the same time.


    2018–2020 with Democratization of AI Tools

  • Widespread adoption of machine learning platforms (like Azure ML, AWS SageMaker, Google Cloud AI).
    CRM vendors started embedding predictive lead scoring, churn prediction, and sentiment analysis as standard features.
    AI chatbots (like Drift, Intercom, Salesforce Einstein Bots) became popular for customer support.

2021–2023 with Generative AI and Conversational AI

  • Language models like OpenAI’s GPT-3 (2020) and subsequent releases inspired CRM providers to explore natural language generation and summarization (e.g. drafting emails, summarizing calls).

  • Salesforce Einstein added more advanced NLP features for case classification and sentiment detection.

  • Microsoft Copilot integrated GPT-based capabilities into Office and Dynamics 365, enabling AI to draft content and analyze conversations.

2023–2025 when AI Becomes Core to CRM Excellence

  • Generative AI transforms content creation, marketing, and personalization—helping sales reps draft proposals, emails, and social posts.

  • Predictive analytics now routinely includes recommendations, churn risk, and customer lifetime value.

  • AI agents assist human agents with next-best-action suggestions, call summarization, and personalized product recommendations

What is Project Management?

Project management is the organized application of knowledge, processes, skills, and tools to guide a project from its beginning to its successful completion. It involves:

  • Defining goals: Deciding what the project should achieve.

  • Planning: Mapping out the steps and resources needed.

  • Executing: Putting the plan into action, directing the team, and managing resources.

  • Monitoring and controlling: Tracking progress, managing changes, and addressing issues.

  • Closing: Reviewing the project, documenting results, and learning from the experience.


What is Business Project Management?

Business project management refers to applying project management principles within a business setting. These projects focus on achieving business objectives such as:

  • Launching new products or services

  • Improving or automating business processes

  • Restructuring departments

  • Implementing new software systems


The Role of Project Management

Project management plays a critical role in businesses because it:

  • Increases Efficiency: A well-defined project plan helps streamline work and avoid wasted effort.

  • Ensures Results: Project management keeps the focus on meeting defined goals within time and budget restrictions.

  • Manages Risk: Potential problems are anticipated and mitigated through careful planning and monitoring.

  • Improves Communication: Clear communication channels among team members, stakeholders, and clients help avoid misunderstandings.

  • Improves Client Satisfaction: Successful project completion within agreed-upon parameters builds trust with clients.


Why is Learning Project Management Important for Companies?

Companies invest in their employees' project management training because:

Competitive Advantage: Companies with strong project management capabilities deliver projects more successfully, gain a reputation for reliability, and outperform competitors.

Reduces Costs: Inefficient projects cost more due to delays and wasted resources. Project management helps optimize resources.

Enhances Employee Morale: Well-run projects minimize stress, improve team collaboration, and create a sense of accomplishment.

Improves Innovation: Structured project management allows for managing innovation projects, leading to a culture of innovation within the company.


How Project Management Skills Boost Your Career

Developing your project management skills can significantly enhance your career prospects:

High Demand: Project managers are in demand across industries like IT, construction, healthcare, etc.

Better Salary: Skilled project managers often earn higher salaries due to their expertise.

Leadership Potential: Project management provides a solid foundation for taking on leadership roles within organizations.

Versatility: Project management skills apply to a wide range of jobs and roles, not just project management positions.

Personal Growth: You'll build organizational, problem-solving, and communication skills, making you an asset to any team


Linked topics:

  • Project Management

  • Basic office skills

  • Basic Business skills

  • Communication skills

  • Organizational skills

courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS Y EL TEMA BLOCKSY?


Una página web es una herramienta excelente para facilitar la comunicación y la interacción con los clientes. A través de un sitio web, los usuarios pueden acceder a información sobre productos y servicios, realizar consultas, solicitar presupuestos, dejar comentarios y mucho más.


Tener una presencia en internet es imprescindible para cualquier tipo de negocio. No importa cuál sea el tamaño de tu negocio o la industria en la que desempeñes tu actividad, la importancia de una página web es indudable, ya que actúa como el mejor escaparate digital, lo que permite que las empresas estén al alcance de cualquiera en todo momento. ¡No estar en línea equivale a perder oportunidades de negocio y visibilidad! En un mundo cada vez más digital, la sostenibilidad de las empresas depende de cómo se adapten estas a la transformación digital.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


¿QUÉ ES BLOCKSY?


Blocksy es un tema gratuito de WordPress que se caracteriza por ser rápido y personalizable. Está diseñado para trabajar con el editor de bloques Gutenberg y el constructor visual de Elementor.

Características:

  • Es compatible con los creadores de páginas de WordPress, como Elementor, Beaver Builder, Visual Composer y Brizy.

  • Está optimizado para SEO.

  • Es adaptable y listo para la traducción.

  • Tiene WooCommerce incorporado.

  • Cuenta con un personalizador en vivo intuitivo.

  • Ofrece sitios de inicio listos para implementar.

  • Tiene muchas opciones de personalización.

  • Permite habilitar la imagen destacada en las páginas.


Usos:


  • Se puede usar para crear sitios de agencias de negocios, tiendas, empresas, educación, restaurantes, blogs, portafolios, páginas de destino, etc.


Ventajas:


  • Su diseño ligero y la carga inteligente de activos ayudan a crear un sitio que se carga rápidamente.

  • Blocksy Pro ofrece un mega menú integrado.

  • Tiene una potente función de diseños personalizados para usuarios avanzados.

  • Cuenta con extensiones únicas que ofrecen funciones útiles.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página web con WordPress y el Tema Blocksy, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

  • Cómo instalar WordPress en tu hosting.

¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB Y GENERAR INGRESOS VENDIENDO TOURS Y PAQUETES TURÍSTICOS ?


WP Travel Engine es un plugin gratuito de WordPress que permite crear y gestionar paquetes de viajes. Está diseñado para agencias de viajes, operadores turísticos y otros negocios relacionados con el turismo.


WP Travel Engine permite:

  • Crear itinerarios ilimitados.

  • Añadir destinos y precios a los viajes.

  • Recibir pagos de los huéspedes.

  • Mejorar el posicionamiento en los motores de búsqueda.

  • Aumentar la tasa de conversión.

  • Crear sitios web optimizados para SEO.

  • Vender paquetes de viajes.

  • Aumentar las reservas, las consultas y el valor del pedido medio (AOV).


WP Travel Engine es compatible con el tema Travel Monster, que permite crear sitios web para agencias de viajes.

WP Travel Engine Pro es una versión con funciones avanzadas que permite ahorrar tiempo en la creación de sitios web para agencias de viajes.


¿CÓMO FUNCIONA LA PLATAFORMA DE WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Empezó en 2003 como un software para blogs, pero con el tiempo ha evolucionado como CMS completo con el que podemos hacer sitios web corporativos, tiendas online, sitios de membresía, intranets y mucho más.


En nuestro curso utilizaremos las últimas técnicas para crear y diseñar una página web para una agencia de viajes, utilizando la plataforma de WordPress, el plugin WP Travel Engine y el tema Travel Monster que nos brinda la flexibilidad de crear y diseñar nuestra página web para una agencia de viajes, que llevarán su diseño web al siguiente nivel.

Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página web para una agencia de viajes, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su página web diseñada con su personalización y a su gusto.

My exposure to AI for Marketing and Advertising Excellence started as early as the 2010s, with Early Adoption in (2010–2015) when AI use was limited, mostly rule-based or algorithmic like

· Programmatic Advertising began using early AI to automatically bid on ads in real-time (Real-Time Bidding, RTB).

· Google and Facebook introduced algorithm-driven ad delivery based on user behavior.

· Basic predictive analytics started helping marketers segment audiences or optimize email open rates.

I continued to learn with Mainstream Emergence of AI for Marketing and Advertising Excellence during 2016–2019 when AI matured with deep learning, NLP, and more affordable cloud computing:

· Chatbots powered by AI began to appear on websites (e.g., Drift, Intercom).

· Facebook, Google, and LinkedIn launched AI-powered ad optimization tools.

· Marketing automation platforms like HubSpot and Salesforce began integrating AI for lead scoring and personalization.

· Recommendation engines, like Netflix and Spotify, began shaping consumer expectations.

I learnt a lot more with Explosion of Use Cases in 2020–2023 when COVID-19 accelerated digital transformation and AI adoption:

· Brands leaned on AI for personalization at scale due to shifts to digital buying behavior.

· NLP models like GPT-3 (2020) revolutionized content generation, chatbot capabilities, and copywriting.

· Tools like Persado, Copyai, Jasper began writing high-converting marketing content.

· AI-driven creative optimization helped marketers test and scale visuals, videos, and messaging automatically.

And I continue to learn more in this Excellence Era (2023–Present) with GPT-4, multimodal AI, and tools like ChatGPT, Gemini, and Claude, AI moved from support to strategic driver:

· AI can now forecast campaign performance, allocate budgets, and optimize cross-channel strategies in real time.

· Marketing Co-Pilots (like Salesforce Einstein, Adobe Sensei, and HubSpot AI) help teams execute faster, smarter.

· AI in image, video, and design generation lets brands keep up with content demand.

I bring in this course my learnings from this journey and share with you how can you also can successfully use AI for Marketing and Advertising Excellence

courseDetails.title: Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y Cloudways 2025
courseDetails.shortDescription: Crea una página web con WordPress y Cloudways, el mejor alojamiento en la nube administrado para WordPress.
courseDetails.longDescription:
¿DESEAS CREAR UNA PÁGINA WEB CON WORPDRESS Y CLOUDWAYS?


Una página web es una herramienta excelente para facilitar la comunicación y la interacción con los clientes. A través de un sitio web, los usuarios pueden acceder a información sobre productos y servicios, realizar consultas, solicitar presupuestos, dejar comentarios y mucho más.


Tener una presencia en internet es imprescindible para cualquier tipo de negocio. No importa cuál sea el tamaño de tu negocio o la industria en la que desempeñes tu actividad, la importancia de una página web es indudable, ya que actúa como el mejor escaparate digital, lo que permite que las empresas estén al alcance de cualquiera en todo momento. ¡No estar en línea equivale a perder oportunidades de negocio y visibilidad! En un mundo cada vez más digital, la sostenibilidad de las empresas depende de cómo se adapten estas a la transformación digital.


¿QUÉ ES CLOUDWAYS?


Cloudways es una plataforma de alojamiento en la nube que permite crear y administrar aplicaciones web. Ofrece servicios de computación en la nube para empresas.

Características:

  • Permite elegir entre varios proveedores de infraestructura en la nube.

  • Ofrece hosting gestionado de WordPress y WooCommerce.

  • Cuenta con un panel de control.

  • Ofrece soporte técnico 24/7.

  • Realiza copias de seguridad gestionadas.

  • Cuenta con seguridad gestionada.

  • Ofrece escalabilidad de rendimiento.

  • Cuenta con almacenamiento en caché avanzado.

  • Ofrece protección contra malware.


Beneficios:


  • Permite a los desarrolladores y negocios concentrarse en sus aplicaciones y sitios web.

  • Elimina la necesidad de conocimientos técnicos avanzados.

  • Permite implementar populares aplicaciones basadas en PHP en el alojamiento de infraestructura.

  • Ofrece una experiencia de hosting gestionado optimizada.

  • Permite migrar sitios web sin interrupciones ni complicaciones.


¿QUÉ ES WORDPRESS?


WordPress es un software gratuito o herramienta de gestión de contenidos, también llamado CMS (Content Management System), diseñada para crear y mantener fácilmente un Blog, un sitio Web o una Tienda Online.


WordPress es sin duda alguna, el mejor gestor de contenidos del mundo, y el más utilizado con diferencia, llegando actualmente a superar el 58% de cuota de mercado. Además es de código abierto y completamente gratuito.


Nuestro curso es 100% práctico, lo guiaremos a través de diversos pasos y juntos crearemos su página web con WordPress y Cloudways, de modo que al finalizar nuestro curso, tendrá su sitio web diseñado con su personalización y a su gusto.

¿QUÉ APRENDERÁS EN NUESTRO CURSO?

  • Cómo crear una cuenta gratis en Cloudways.

  • Cómo crear un servidor e instalar WordPress en Cloudways.

  • Cómo instalar una plantilla para tu sitio web.

  • Cómo personalizar la cabecera y el pie de página de tu sitio web.

  • Cómo editar las páginas de tu sitio web con Elementor.

  • Cómo apuntar un dominio a tu servidor de Cloudways.

  • Cómo instalar un certificado SSL para tu sitio web.



¿POR QUÉ ACCEDER A NUESTRO CURSO?


Nuestro curso de "Cómo Crear una Página Web con WordPress y Cloudways", es impartido por el experto y consultor de marketing digital: "Renato Yacolca",  creador de uno de los canales de YouTube más populares del mundo en los temas de tutoriales y marketing digital: Programación Fácil, SEO y Marketing, con más de 185,000 estudiantes (Botón de Plata de YouTube), en el que le mostrará las diversas formas de crear un sitio web con WordPress y Cloudways de forma rápida y sencilla.


¡ACCEDE AHORA AL CURSO!

courseDetails.title: Managing HR + People Risks, HR Compliance, ISO 31000  [EN]
courseDetails.shortDescription: HR Risks | ISO 31000 | Human Error | Risk Assessment | Culture Audit | Leadership Accountability | Mitigation Strategies
courseDetails.longDescription:
Every organization faces risk, but few understand how deeply human behavior drives those risks. In this hands-on course, you will master HR Risk Management — from identifying vulnerabilities in employee behavior and company culture to implementing mitigation strategies aligned with ISO 31000 standards.


You’ll explore how to assess internal and external people risks, build a culture of accountability, prevent fraud, and respond to crisis scenarios effectively. With practical frameworks, real company case studies, and expert-checked homework assignments, you’ll leave with a risk control system ready to deploy.


What you’ll learn in this course:


  • Understand human-driven business risks and the HR role in managing them

  • Apply global models like the Risk Heat Map, 4I Model, and ISO 31000

  • Analyze organizational culture and leadership behaviors that influence risk

  • Set up your own HR risk management system and audit plan

  • Prevent leadership pitfalls and cultural blind spots before they damage performance


Course Program Includes:


  1. Introduction to HR Risks


    • Human error, decision-making flaws, and risk triggers in business


  2. Risk Models and Tools


    • Risk heat maps, fraud triangles, HR risk thermographics


  3. Human Factors Behind Risks


    • Biases, conflicts of interest, and poor judgment patterns


  4. Risk Identification and Analysis


    • Case studies, incident mapping, company-wide threat detection


  5. Building a Risk System


    • ISO 31000 principles, personnel risk hierarchy, mitigation planning


  6. Leadership Risk & Dynamics


    • How CEOs and leadership teams become risk factors themselves


  7. Cultural Risk Impact


    • Trust erosion, weak values, and cultural red flags


  8. Accountability and Audit Models


    • 3 Lines of Defence, HR’s role in risk monitoring


  9. Improving Decisions


    • Checklists, de-biasing tools, decision safeguards


  10. Ethics and Personal Responsibility

    Codes of conduct, personal role in organizational security

This course contains the use of artificial intelligence. It ensures cutting-edge insights and the latest practices.

This course contains a promotion. 

By the end, you’ll have a complete roadmap for managing people-related risk in your company — and the skills to become the go-to expert in HR compliance, governance, and cultural integrity.


Ready to safeguard your company’s future? Enroll now and build your HR risk management system step by step.
